page.description: Simplify the filter expression if possible.
page.syntax: New_Filter_String as C = EXPRESSION_COMMON_FILTER_ELIMINATE( C expression)

argument.name: expression
argument.description: A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and filters records in a query.

page.example: filter = "state = 'ma' .and. state = 'ma'" expression_common_filter_eliminate(filter) -> "state = 'ma'", because both clauses are the same filter = "state = 'ma' .and. state = 'cd'" expression_common_filter_eliminate(filter) -> "state = 'ma' .and. state = 'cd'"
